name: NETXP LINUX Socket Creation detected
description: Monitors socket creations for both IPv4 and IPv6, enhancing visibility into network-related activities. This rule helps in tracking the creation of network sockets, providing insights into communication activities and potential network-based security threats.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "network_socket_created" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
